Uses of Class
com.k2.Proforma.Proforma

    • Uses of Proforma in com.k2.Proforma

      Methods in com.k2.Proforma that return Proforma 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Proforma Proforma.add(java.lang.Object... parts)
      Add a line to the proforma comprising the given parts in order
      Proforma Proforma.set(java.lang.String alias, CallBack<java.lang.String> callBack)
      Set the value for the parameter identified by alias to the give call back.
      Proforma Proforma.set(java.lang.String alias, CallBack<java.lang.String> callBack, boolean continuous)
      Set the value for the parameter identified by alias to the given call back specifying whether or not to continuously execute the call back
      Proforma Proforma.set(java.lang.String alias, java.lang.String value)
      Set the value of the parameter with the given alias to the given value
      Proforma Proforma.setAutoIncrementIndent(boolean autoIncrementIndent)
      Identifies that this proforma should automatically increase the given indent
      Proforma Proforma.setCarriageReturn(Proforma.CarriageReturn cr)
      Set the carriage return to the given carriage return format
      Proforma Proforma.setCarriageReturn(java.lang.String cr)
      Set the carriage return to the given string
      Proforma Proforma.setEmbedded(boolean embedded)
      Identifies that this proforma is embedded Embedded proformas omit the indent on the first line and the carriage return on the last line
      Proforma Proforma.setIndent(java.lang.String indent)
      Set the string to be repeated for the indent.
